trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSC703_01015_SEQ_00<tab>Slafswys has a plan that requires an adventurer's aid.

TEXT_GAIUSC703_01015_SEQ_01<tab>Slafswys would carry out a preemptive strike against the kobolds, and would recruit the pirates of Limsa to the cause. Convey her message to Commander Bloeidin at Camp Overlook.
TEXT_GAIUSC703_01015_SEQ_02<tab>Commander Bloeidin expresses his admiration for Slafswys's courage and ingenuity, and appears willing to offer his aid in the operation.
TEXT_GAIUSC703_01015_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Bloeidin at Camp Overlook.
TEXT_GAIUSC703_01015_SLAFSWYS_000_000<tab>Read the riptides and the winds, and brace yerself for the comin' storm... Learned as much when I sailed as a Yellowjacket, aye.

TEXT_GAIUSC703_01015_SLAFSWYS_000_001<tab>The wisdom of the seas has served me just as well on land. The beast tribes are a storm in the brewin', and neither the Scions nor the city<var 1F /var>states can allow themselves to be caught unawares.
TEXT_GAIUSC703_01015_SLAFSWYS_000_002<tab>Nay, we must strike first and nip the storm in the bud. I'd start with the kobolds─I reckon they've grown a bit too big for their breeches of late.

TEXT_GAIUSC703_01015_SLAFSWYS_000_003<tab>One more thing I learned as a Yellowjacket is that yer ship is only as steady as yer crew. Before takin' on the kobolds, I've a mind to round up some new allies.
TEXT_GAIUSC703_01015_SLAFSWYS_000_004<tab>In Camp Overlook, ye'll find a crew of pirates who've given up pillagin' and plunderin', and now fly the flag of the Maelstrom.

TEXT_GAIUSC703_01015_SLAFSWYS_000_005<tab>I'd bring them onboard to fight the kobold menace, but I've a notion that an honest plea from yerself would be more convincin'. Might ye travel to Camp Overlook and speak to Commander Bloeidin in my stead? Ye'd be doin' us a great service, aye.
TEXT_GAIUSC703_01015_BLOEIDIN_000_010<tab>Adventurer, eh? With a message from Slafswys, you say?
TEXT_GAIUSC703_01015_BLOEIDIN_000_011<tab>Eh? A preemptive strike to take the wind out of the kobolds' sails before they can mount an attack?

TEXT_GAIUSC703_01015_BLOEIDIN_000_012<tab>And she'd recruit old buccaneers like <var 1A 02 /var>us<var 1A 01 /var> for the effort? This, when even Admiral Merlwyb has her hands full with the damn beasts? Why, that's either the most barnacle-brained idea I've heard...or the most bloody brilliant!

TEXT_GAIUSC703_01015_BLOEIDIN_000_013<tab>Gahaha! I'll confess─I had my doubts when I heard she was leaving the Yellowjackets, but I see that wench's as salty a sea dog as ever. Aye, this should prove most interesting.
